00024 /*
00025  * THIS DOCUMENTATION STOLEN DIRECTLY FROM GOOGLE CLOSURE (licensed under Apache 2)
00026  * 
00027  * Different web browsers have very different keyboard event handling. Most
00028  * importantly is that only certain browsers repeat keydown events:
00029  * IE, Opera, FF/Win32, and Safari 3 repeat keydown events.
00030  * FF/Mac and Safari 2 do not.
00031  *
00032  * For the purposes of this code, "Safari 3" means WebKit 525+, when WebKit
00033  * decided that they should try to match IE's key handling behavior.
00034  * Safari 3.0.4, which shipped with Leopard (WebKit 523), has the
00035  * Safari 2 behavior.
00036  *
00037  * Firefox, Safari, Opera prevent on keypress
00038  *
00039  * IE prevents on keydown
00040  *
00041  * Firefox does not fire keypress for shift, ctrl, alt
00042  * Firefox does fire keydown for shift, ctrl, alt, meta
00043  * Firefox does not repeat keydown for shift, ctrl, alt, meta
00044  *
00045  * Firefox does not fire keypress for up and down in an input
00046  *
00047  * Opera fires keypress for shift, ctrl, alt, meta
00048  * Opera does not repeat keypress for shift, ctrl, alt, meta
00049  *
00050  * Safari 2 and 3 do not fire keypress for shift, ctrl, alt
00051  * Safari 2 does not fire keydown for shift, ctrl, alt
00052  * Safari 3 *does* fire keydown for shift, ctrl, alt
00053  *
00054  * IE provides the keycode for keyup/down events and the charcode (in the
00055  * keycode field) for keypress.
00056  *
00057  * Mozilla provides the keycode for keyup/down and the charcode for keypress
00058  * unless it's a non text modifying key in which case the keycode is provided.
00059  *
00060  * Safari 3 provides the keycode and charcode for all events.
00061  *
00062  * Opera provides the keycode for keyup/down event and either the charcode or
00063  * the keycode (in the keycode field) for keypress events.
00064  *
00065  * Firefox x11 doesn't fire keydown events if a another key is already held down
00066  * until the first key is released. This can cause a key event to be fired with
00067  * a keyCode for the first key and a charCode for the second key.
00068  *
00069  * Safari 2 in keypress (not supported)
00070  *
00071  *        charCode keyCode which
00072  * ENTER:       13      13    13
00073  * F1:       63236   63236 63236
00074  * F8:       63243   63243 63243
00075  * ...
00076  * p:          112     112   112
00077  * P:           80      80    80
00078  *
00079  * Firefox, keypress:
00080  *
00081  *        charCode keyCode which
00082  * ENTER:        0      13    13
00083  * F1:           0     112     0
00084  * F8:           0     119     0
00085  * ...
00086  * p:          112       0   112
00087  * P:           80       0    80
00088  *
00089  * Opera, Mac+Win32, keypress:
00090  *
00091  *         charCode keyCode which
00092  * ENTER: undefined      13    13
00093  * F1:    undefined     112     0
00094  * F8:    undefined     119     0
00095  * ...
00096  * p:     undefined     112   112
00097  * P:     undefined      80    80
00098  *
00099  * IE7, keydown
00100  *
00101  *         charCode keyCode     which
00102  * ENTER: undefined      13 undefined
00103  * F1:    undefined     112 undefined
00104  * F8:    undefined     119 undefined
00105  * ...
00106  * p:     undefined      80 undefined
00107  * P:     undefined      80 undefined
00108  */
00109

00132 //right now we hard code q, w, r and t as keys to propogate
00133 //these aren't normal keycodes, they are with modifier key codes
00134 //might be mac only, we should investigate futher later.
00135 var KeyCodesToPrevent = {},
00136     CharacterKeysToPrevent = {},
00137     MozKeyCodeToKeyCodeMap = {
00138         61: 187,  // =, equals
00139         59: 186   // ;, semicolon
00140     };

00148 - (id)_init
00149 {
00150     self = [super init];
00151 
00152     if (self)
00153     {
00154         _DOMWindow = window;
00155         _contentRect = _CGRectMakeZero();
00156 
00157         _windowLevels = [];
00158         _windowLayers = [CPDictionary dictionary];
00159 
00160         [self registerDOMWindow];
00161         [self updateFromNativeContentRect];
00162 
00163         _charCodes = {};
00164     }
00165 
00166     return self;
00167 }
00168 
00169 - (CGRect)nativeContentRect
00170 {
00171     if (!_DOMWindow)
00172         return [self contentRect];
00173 
00174     if (_DOMWindow.cpFrame)
00175         return _DOMWindow.cpFrame();
00176 
00177     var contentRect = _CGRectMakeZero();
00178 
00179     if (window.screenTop)
00180         contentRect.origin = _CGPointMake(_DOMWindow.screenLeft, _DOMWindow.screenTop);
00181 
00182     else if (window.screenX)
00183         contentRect.origin = _CGPointMake(_DOMWindow.screenX, _DOMWindow.screenY);
00184 
00185     // Safari, Mozilla, Firefox, and Opera
00186     if (_DOMWindow.innerWidth)
00187         contentRect.size = _CGSizeMake(_DOMWindow.innerWidth, _DOMWindow.innerHeight);
00188 
00189     // Internet Explorer 6 in Strict Mode
00190     else if (document.documentElement && document.documentElement.clientWidth)
00191         contentRect.size = _CGSizeMake(_DOMWindow.document.documentElement.clientWidth, _DOMWindow.document.documentElement.clientHeight);
00192 
00193     // Internet Explorer X
00194     else
00195         contentRect.size = _CGSizeMake(_DOMWindow.document.body.clientWidth, _DOMWindow.document.body.clientHeight);
00196 
00197     return contentRect;
00198 }
00199 
00200 - (void)updateNativeContentRect
00201 {
00202     if (!_DOMWindow)
00203         return;
00204 
00205     if (typeof _DOMWindow["cpSetFrame"] === "function")
00206         return _DOMWindow.cpSetFrame([self contentRect]);
00207 
00208     var origin = [self contentRect].origin,
00209         nativeOrigin = [self nativeContentRect].origin;
00210 
00211     if (origin.x !== nativeOrigin.x || origin.y !== nativeOrigin.y)
00212     {
00213         _DOMWindow.moveBy(origin.x - nativeOrigin.x, origin.y - nativeOrigin.y);
00214     }
00215 
00216     var size = [self contentRect].size,
00217         nativeSize = [self nativeContentRect].size;
00218 
00219     if (size.width !== nativeSize.width || size.height !== nativeSize.height)
00220     {
00221         _DOMWindow.resizeBy(size.width - nativeSize.width, size.height - nativeSize.height);
00222     }
00223 }

00226 {
00227     if (_DOMWindow)
00228         _DOMWindow.blur();
00229 }

00231 - (void)createDOMElements
00232 {
00233     var theDocument = _DOMWindow.document;
00234 
00235     // This guy fixes an issue in Firefox where if you focus the URL field, we stop getting key events
00236     _DOMFocusElement = theDocument.createElement("input");
00237 
00238     _DOMFocusElement.style.position = "absolute";
00239     _DOMFocusElement.style.zIndex = "-1000";
00240     _DOMFocusElement.style.opacity = "0";
00241     _DOMFocusElement.style.filter = "alpha(opacity=0)";
00242     _DOMFocusElement.className = "cpdontremove";
00243 
00244     _DOMBodyElement.appendChild(_DOMFocusElement);
00245 
00246     // Create Native Pasteboard handler.
00247     _DOMPasteboardElement = theDocument.createElement("textarea");
00248 
00249     _DOMPasteboardElement.style.position = "absolute";
00250     _DOMPasteboardElement.style.top = "-10000px";
00251     _DOMPasteboardElement.style.zIndex = "999";
00252     _DOMPasteboardElement.className = "cpdontremove";
00253 
00254     _DOMBodyElement.appendChild(_DOMPasteboardElement);
00255 
00256     // Make sure the pastboard element is blurred.
00257     _DOMPasteboardElement.blur();
00258 }

00260 - (void)registerDOMWindow
00261 {
00262     var theDocument = _DOMWindow.document;
00263 
00264     _DOMBodyElement = theDocument.getElementById("cappuccino-body") || theDocument.body;
00265 
00266     // FIXME: Always do this?
00267     if ([CPPlatform supportsDragAndDrop])
00268         _DOMBodyElement.style["-khtml-user-select"] = "none";
00269 
00270     _DOMBodyElement.webkitTouchCallout = "none";
00271 
00272     [self createDOMElements];
00273     [self _addLayers];
00274 
00275     var theClass = [self class],
00276 
00277         dragEventImplementation = class_getMethodImplementation(theClass, @selector(dragEvent:)),
00278         dragEventCallback = function (anEvent) { dragEventImplementation(self, nil, anEvent); },
00279 
00280         resizeEventSelector = @selector(resizeEvent:),
00281         resizeEventImplementation = class_getMethodImplementation(theClass, resizeEventSelector),
00282         resizeEventCallback = function (anEvent) { resizeEventImplementation(self, nil, anEvent); },
00283 
00284         copyEventSelector = @selector(copyEvent:),
00285         copyEventImplementation = class_getMethodImplementation(theClass, copyEventSelector),
00286         copyEventCallback = function (anEvent) {copyEventImplementation(self, nil, anEvent); },
00287 
00288         pasteEventSelector = @selector(pasteEvent:),
00289         pasteEventImplementation = class_getMethodImplementation(theClass, pasteEventSelector),
00290         pasteEventCallback = function (anEvent) {pasteEventImplementation(self, nil, anEvent); },
00291 
00292         keyEventSelector = @selector(keyEvent:),
00293         keyEventImplementation = class_getMethodImplementation(theClass, keyEventSelector),
00294         keyEventCallback = function (anEvent) { keyEventImplementation(self, nil, anEvent); },
00295         
00296         mouseEventSelector = @selector(mouseEvent:),
00297         mouseEventImplementation = class_getMethodImplementation(theClass, mouseEventSelector),
00298         mouseEventCallback = function (anEvent) { mouseEventImplementation(self, nil, anEvent); },
00299         
00300         scrollEventSelector = @selector(scrollEvent:),
00301         scrollEventImplementation = class_getMethodImplementation(theClass, scrollEventSelector),
00302         scrollEventCallback = function (anEvent) { scrollEventImplementation(self, nil, anEvent); },
00303         
00304         touchEventSelector = @selector(touchEvent:),
00305         touchEventImplementation = class_getMethodImplementation(theClass, touchEventSelector),
00306         touchEventCallback = function (anEvent) { touchEventImplementation(self, nil, anEvent); };
00307 
00308 
00309     if (theDocument.addEventListener)
00310     {
00311         if ([CPPlatform supportsDragAndDrop])
00312         {
00313             theDocument.addEventListener("dragstart", dragEventCallback, NO);
00314             theDocument.addEventListener("drag", dragEventCallback, NO);
00315             theDocument.addEventListener("dragend", dragEventCallback, NO);
00316             theDocument.addEventListener("dragover", dragEventCallback, NO);
00317             theDocument.addEventListener("dragleave", dragEventCallback, NO);
00318             theDocument.addEventListener("drop", dragEventCallback, NO);
00319         }
00320 
00321         theDocument.addEventListener("mouseup", mouseEventCallback, NO);
00322         theDocument.addEventListener("mousedown", mouseEventCallback, NO);
00323         theDocument.addEventListener("mousemove", mouseEventCallback, NO);
00324 
00325         theDocument.addEventListener("beforecopy", copyEventCallback, NO);
00326         theDocument.addEventListener("beforecut", copyEventCallback, NO);
00327         theDocument.addEventListener("beforepaste", pasteEventCallback, NO);
00328 
00329         theDocument.addEventListener("keyup", keyEventCallback, NO);
00330         theDocument.addEventListener("keydown", keyEventCallback, NO);
00331         theDocument.addEventListener("keypress", keyEventCallback, NO);
00332 
00333         theDocument.addEventListener("touchstart", touchEventCallback, NO);
00334         theDocument.addEventListener("touchend", touchEventCallback, NO);
00335         theDocument.addEventListener("touchmove", touchEventCallback, NO);
00336         theDocument.addEventListener("touchcancel", touchEventCallback, NO);
00337 
00338         _DOMWindow.addEventListener("DOMMouseScroll", scrollEventCallback, NO);
00339         _DOMWindow.addEventListener("mousewheel", scrollEventCallback, NO);
00340 
00341         _DOMWindow.addEventListener("resize", resizeEventCallback, NO);        
00342 
00343         _DOMWindow.addEventListener("unload", function()
00344         {
00345             [self updateFromNativeContentRect];
00346             [self _removeLayers];
00347 
00348             theDocument.removeEventListener("mouseup", mouseEventCallback, NO);
00349             theDocument.removeEventListener("mousedown", mouseEventCallback, NO);
00350             theDocument.removeEventListener("mousemove", mouseEventCallback, NO);
00351 
00352             theDocument.removeEventListener("keyup", keyEventCallback, NO);
00353             theDocument.removeEventListener("keydown", keyEventCallback, NO);
00354             theDocument.removeEventListener("keypress", keyEventCallback, NO);
00355 
00356             theDocument.removeEventListener("beforecopy", copyEventCallback, NO);
00357             theDocument.removeEventListener("beforecut", copyEventCallback, NO);
00358             theDocument.removeEventListener("beforepaste", pasteEventCallback, NO);
00359 
00360             theDocument.removeEventListener("touchstart", touchEventCallback, NO);
00361             theDocument.removeEventListener("touchend", touchEventCallback, NO);
00362             theDocument.removeEventListener("touchmove", touchEventCallback, NO);
00363 
00364             _DOMWindow.removeEventListener("resize", resizeEventCallback, NO);
00365 
00366             //FIXME: does firefox really need a different value?
00367             _DOMWindow.removeEventListener("DOMMouseScroll", scrollEventCallback, NO);
00368             _DOMWindow.removeEventListener("mousewheel", scrollEventCallback, NO);
00369 
00370             //_DOMWindow.removeEventListener("beforeunload", this, NO);
00371 
00372             [PlatformWindows removeObject:self];
00373 
00374             self._DOMWindow = nil;
00375         }, NO);
00376     }
00377     else
00378     {
00379         theDocument.attachEvent("onmouseup", mouseEventCallback);
00380         theDocument.attachEvent("onmousedown", mouseEventCallback);
00381         theDocument.attachEvent("onmousemove", mouseEventCallback);
00382         theDocument.attachEvent("ondblclick", mouseEventCallback);
00383         
00384         theDocument.attachEvent("onkeyup", keyEventCallback);
00385         theDocument.attachEvent("onkeydown", keyEventCallback);
00386         theDocument.attachEvent("onkeypress", keyEventCallback);
00387         
00388         _DOMWindow.attachEvent("onresize", resizeEventCallback);
00389         
00390         _DOMWindow.onmousewheel = scrollEventCallback;
00391         theDocument.onmousewheel = scrollEventCallback;
00392         
00393         _DOMBodyElement.ondrag = function () { return NO; };
00394         _DOMBodyElement.onselectstart = function () { return _DOMWindow.event.srcElement === _DOMPasteboardElement; };
00395 
00396         _DOMWindow.attachEvent("onbeforeunload", function()
00397         {
00398             [self updateFromNativeContentRect];
00399             [self _removeLayers];
00400 
00401             theDocument.detachEvent("onmouseup", mouseEventCallback);
00402             theDocument.detachEvent("onmousedown", mouseEventCallback);
00403             theDocument.detachEvent("onmousemove", mouseEventCallback);
00404             theDocument.detachEvent("ondblclick", mouseEventCallback);
00405 
00406             theDocument.detachEvent("onkeyup", keyEventCallback);
00407             theDocument.detachEvent("onkeydown", keyEventCallback);
00408             theDocument.detachEvent("onkeypress", keyEventCallback);
00409 
00410             _DOMWindow.detachEvent("onresize", resizeEventCallback);
00411 
00412             _DOMWindow.onmousewheel = NULL;
00413             theDocument.onmousewheel = NULL;
00414 
00415             _DOMBodyElement.ondrag = NULL;
00416             _DOMBodyElement.onselectstart = NULL;
00417 
00418             //_DOMWindow.removeEvent("beforeunload", this);
00419 
00420             [PlatformWindows removeObject:self];
00421 
00422             self._DOMWindow = nil;
00423         }, NO);
00424     }
00425 }

00427 + (CPSet)visiblePlatformWindows

00432 - (void)orderFront:(id)aSender
00433 {
00434     if (_DOMWindow)
00435         return _DOMWindow.focus();
00436 
00437     _DOMWindow = window.open("", "_blank", "menubar=no,location=no,resizable=yes,scrollbars=no,status=no,left=" + _CGRectGetMinX(_contentRect) + ",top=" + _CGRectGetMinY(_contentRect) + ",width=" + _CGRectGetWidth(_contentRect) + ",height=" + _CGRectGetHeight(_contentRect));
00438 
00439     [PlatformWindows addObject:self];
00440 
00441     // FIXME: cpSetFrame?
00442     _DOMWindow.document.write("<html><head></head><body style = 'background-color:transparent;'></body></html>");
00443     _DOMWindow.document.close();
00444 
00445     if (![CPPlatform isBrowser])
00446     {
00447         _DOMWindow.cpWindowNumber = [self._only windowNumber];
00448         _DOMWindow.cpSetFrame(_contentRect);
00449         _DOMWindow.cpSetLevel(_level);
00450         _DOMWindow.cpSetHasShadow(_hasShadow);
00451         _DOMWindow.cpSetShadowStyle(_shadowStyle);
00452     }
00453 
00454     [self registerDOMWindow];
00455 
00456     _DOMBodyElement.style.cursor = [[CPCursor currentCursor] _cssString];
00457 }

00459 - (void)orderOut:(id)aSender
00460 {
00461     if (!_DOMWindow)
00462         return;
00463 
00464     _DOMWindow.close();
00465 }

00467 - (void)dragEvent:(DOMEvent)aDOMEvent
00468 {
00469     var type = aDOMEvent.type,
00470         dragServer = [CPDragServer sharedDragServer],
00471         location = _CGPointMake(aDOMEvent.clientX, aDOMEvent.clientY),
00472         pasteboard = [_CPDOMDataTransferPasteboard DOMDataTransferPasteboard];
00473 
00474     [pasteboard _setDataTransfer:aDOMEvent.dataTransfer];
00475 
00476     if (aDOMEvent.type === "dragstart")
00477     {
00478         [[CPRunLoop currentRunLoop] limitDateForMode:CPDefaultRunLoopMode];
00479 
00480         [pasteboard _setPasteboard:[dragServer draggingPasteboard]];
00481 
00482         var draggedWindow = [dragServer draggedWindow],
00483             draggedWindowFrame = [draggedWindow frame],
00484             DOMDragElement = draggedWindow._DOMElement;
00485 
00486         DOMDragElement.style.left = -_CGRectGetWidth(draggedWindowFrame) + "px";
00487         DOMDragElement.style.top = -_CGRectGetHeight(draggedWindowFrame) + "px";
00488 
00489         _DOMBodyElement.appendChild(DOMDragElement);
00490 
00491         var draggingOffset = [dragServer draggingOffset];
00492 
00493         aDOMEvent.dataTransfer.setDragImage(DOMDragElement, draggingOffset.width, draggingOffset.height);
00494         aDOMEvent.dataTransfer.effectAllowed = "all";
00495 
00496         [dragServer draggingStartedInPlatformWindow:self globalLocation:[CPPlatform isBrowser] ? location : _CGPointMake(aDOMEvent.screenX, aDOMEvent.screenY)];
00497     }
00498 
00499     else if (type === "drag")
00500     {
00501         var y = aDOMEvent.screenY;
00502 
00503         if (CPFeatureIsCompatible(CPHTML5DragAndDropSourceYOffBy1))
00504             y -= 1;
00505 
00506         [dragServer draggingSourceUpdatedWithGlobalLocation:[CPPlatform isBrowser] ? location : _CGPointMake(aDOMEvent.screenX, y)];
00507     }
00508 
00509     else if (type === "dragover" || type === "dragleave")
00510     {
00511         if (aDOMEvent.preventDefault)
00512             aDOMEvent.preventDefault();
00513 
00514         var dropEffect = "none",
00515             dragOperation = [dragServer draggingUpdatedInPlatformWindow:self location:location];
00516 
00517         if (dragOperation === CPDragOperationMove || dragOperation === CPDragOperationGeneric || dragOperation === CPDragOperationPrivate)
00518             dropEffect = "move";
00519 
00520         else if (dragOperation === CPDragOperationCopy)
00521             dropEffect = "copy";
00522 
00523         else if (dragOperation === CPDragOperationLink)
00524             dropEffect = "link";
00525 
00526         aDOMEvent.dataTransfer.dropEffect = dropEffect;
00527     }
00528 
00529     else if (type === "dragend")
00530     {
00531         var dropEffect = aDOMEvent.dataTransfer.dropEffect;
00532 
00533         if (dropEffect === "move")
00534             dragOperation = CPDragOperationMove;
00535         else if (dropEffect === "copy")
00536             dragOperation = CPDragOperationCopy;
00537         else if (dropEffect === "link")
00538             dragOperation = CPDragOperationLink;
00539         else
00540             dragOperation = CPDragOperationNone;
00541 
00542         [dragServer draggingEndedInPlatformWindow:self globalLocation:[CPPlatform isBrowser] ? location : _CGPointMake(aDOMEvent.screenX, aDOMEvent.screenY) operation:dragOperation];
00543     }
00544 
00545     else //if (type === "drop")
00546     {
00547         [dragServer performDragOperationInPlatformWindow:self];
00548 
00549         // W3C Model
00550         if (aDOMEvent.preventDefault)
00551             aDOMEvent.preventDefault();
00552 
00553         if (aDOMEvent.stopPropagation)
00554             aDOMEvent.stopPropagation();
00555     }
00556 
00557     [[CPRunLoop currentRunLoop] limitDateForMode:CPDefaultRunLoopMode];
00558 }
00559 
00560 - (void)keyEvent:(DOMEvent)aDOMEvent
00561 {
00562     var event,
00563         timestamp = aDOMEvent.timeStamp ? aDOMEvent.timeStamp : new Date(),
00564         sourceElement = (aDOMEvent.target || aDOMEvent.srcElement),
00565         windowNumber = [[CPApp keyWindow] windowNumber],
00566         modifierFlags = (aDOMEvent.shiftKey ? CPShiftKeyMask : 0) | 
00567                         (aDOMEvent.ctrlKey ? CPControlKeyMask : 0) | 
00568                         (aDOMEvent.altKey ? CPAlternateKeyMask : 0) | 
00569                         (aDOMEvent.metaKey ? CPCommandKeyMask : 0);
00570 
00571     //We want to stop propagation if this is a command key AND this character or keycode has been added to our blacklist    
00572     StopDOMEventPropagation = !!(!(modifierFlags & (CPControlKeyMask | CPCommandKeyMask)) ||
00573                               CharacterKeysToPrevent[String.fromCharCode(aDOMEvent.keyCode || aDOMEvent.charCode).toLowerCase()] ||
00574                               KeyCodesToPrevent[aDOMEvent.keyCode]);
00575 
00576     var isNativePasteEvent = NO,
00577         isNativeCopyOrCutEvent = NO,
00578         overrideCharacters = nil;
00579 
00580     switch (aDOMEvent.type)
00581     {
00582         case "keydown":     // Grab and store the keycode now since it is correct and consistent at this point.
00583                             if (aDOMEvent.keyCode.keyCode in MozKeyCodeToKeyCodeMap)
00584                                 _keyCode = MozKeyCodeToKeyCodeMap[aDOMEvent.keyCode];
00585                             else
00586                                 _keyCode = aDOMEvent.keyCode;
00587 
00588                             var characters = String.fromCharCode(_keyCode).toLowerCase();
00589                             overrideCharacters = (modifierFlags & CPShiftKeyMask || _capsLockActive) ? characters.toUpperCase() : characters;
00590 
00591                             // check for caps lock state
00592                             if (_keyCode === CPKeyCodes.CAPS_LOCK)
00593                                 _capsLockActive = YES;
00594 
00595                             if (modifierFlags & (CPControlKeyMask | CPCommandKeyMask))
00596                             {
00597                                 //we are simply going to skip all keypress events that use cmd/ctrl key
00598                                 //this lets us be consistent in all browsers and send on the keydown
00599                                 //which means we can cancel the event early enough, but only if sendEvent needs to
00600 
00601                                 var eligibleForCopyPaste = [self _validateCopyCutOrPasteEvent:aDOMEvent flags:modifierFlags];
00602 
00603                                 // If this could be a native PASTE event, then we need to further examine it before 
00604                                 // sending a CPEvent.  Select our element to see if anything gets pasted in it.
00605                                 if (characters === "v" && eligibleForCopyPaste)
00606                                 {
00607                                     if (!_ignoreNativePastePreparation)
00608                                     {
00609                                         _DOMPasteboardElement.select();
00610                                         _DOMPasteboardElement.value = "";
00611                                     }
00612 
00613                                     isNativePasteEvent = YES;
00614                                 }
00615 
00616                                 // However, of this could be a native COPY event, we need to let the normal event-process take place so it 
00617                                 // can capture our internal Cappuccino pasteboard.
00618                                 else if ((characters == "c" || characters == "x") && eligibleForCopyPaste)
00619                                 {
00620                                     isNativeCopyOrCutEvent = YES;
00621 
00622                                     if (_ignoreNativeCopyOrCutEvent)
00623                                         break;
00624                                 }
00625                             }
00626                             else if (CPKeyCodes.firesKeyPressEvent(_keyCode, _lastKey, aDOMEvent.shiftKey, aDOMEvent.ctrlKey, aDOMEvent.altKey))
00627                             {
00628                                 // this branch is taken by events which fire keydown, keypress, and keyup.
00629                                 // this is the only time we'll ALLOW character keys to propagate (needed for text fields)
00630                                 StopDOMEventPropagation = NO;
00631                                 break;
00632                             }
00633                             else
00634                             {
00635                                 //this branch is taken by "remedial" key events
00636                                 // In this state we continue to keypress and send the CPEvent
00637                             }
00638                             
00639         case "keypress":
00640                             // we unconditionally break on keypress events with modifiers, 
00641                             // because we forced the event to be sent on the keydown 
00642                             if (aDOMEvent.type === "keypress" && (modifierFlags & (CPControlKeyMask | CPCommandKeyMask)))
00643                                 break;
00644 
00645                             var keyCode = _keyCode,
00646                                 charCode = aDOMEvent.keyCode || aDOMEvent.charCode,
00647                                 isARepeat = (_charCodes[keyCode] != nil);
00648 
00649                             _lastKey = keyCode;
00650                             _charCodes[keyCode] = charCode;
00651 
00652                             var characters = overrideCharacters || String.fromCharCode(charCode),
00653                                 charactersIgnoringModifiers = characters.toLowerCase();
00654 
00655                             // Safari won't send proper capitalization during cmd-key events
00656                             if (!overrideCharacters && (modifierFlags & CPCommandKeyMask) && ((modifierFlags & CPShiftKeyMask) || _capsLockActive))
00657                                 characters = characters.toUpperCase();
00658 
00659                             event = [CPEvent keyEventWithType:CPKeyDown location:location modifierFlags:modifierFlags
00660                                         timestamp:timestamp windowNumber:windowNumber context:nil
00661                                         characters:characters charactersIgnoringModifiers:charactersIgnoringModifiers isARepeat:isARepeat keyCode:keyCode];
00662 
00663                             if (isNativePasteEvent)
00664                             {
00665                                 _pasteboardKeyDownEvent = event;
00666                                 window.setNativeTimeout(function () { [self _checkPasteboardElement] }, 0);
00667                             }
00668 
00669                             break;
00670         
00671         case "keyup":       var keyCode = aDOMEvent.keyCode,
00672                                 charCode = _charCodes[keyCode];
00673                             
00674                             _keyCode = -1;
00675                             _lastKey = -1;
00676                             _charCodes[keyCode] = nil;
00677                             _ignoreNativeCopyOrCutEvent = NO;
00678                             _ignoreNativePastePreparation = NO;
00679 
00680                             // check for caps lock state
00681                             if (keyCode === CPKeyCodes.CAPS_LOCK)
00682                                 _capsLockActive = NO;
00683 
00684                             var characters = String.fromCharCode(charCode),
00685                                 charactersIgnoringModifiers = characters.toLowerCase();
00686                                 
00687                             if (!(modifierFlags & CPShiftKeyMask) && (modifierFlags & CPCommandKeyMask) && !_capsLockActive)
00688                                 characters = charactersIgnoringModifiers;
00689                             
00690                             event = [CPEvent keyEventWithType:CPKeyUp location:location modifierFlags:modifierFlags
00691                                         timestamp: timestamp windowNumber:windowNumber context:nil
00692                                         characters:characters charactersIgnoringModifiers:charactersIgnoringModifiers isARepeat:NO keyCode:keyCode];
00693                             break;
00694     }
00695 
00696     if (event && !isNativePasteEvent)
00697     {
00698         event._DOMEvent = aDOMEvent;
00699 
00700         [CPApp sendEvent:event];
00701 
00702         if (isNativeCopyOrCutEvent)
00703         {
00704             // If this is a native copy event, then check if the pasteboard has anything in it.
00705             [self _primePasteboardElement];
00706         }
00707     }
00708 
00709     if (StopDOMEventPropagation)
00710         CPDOMEventStop(aDOMEvent, self);
00711 
00712     [[CPRunLoop currentRunLoop] limitDateForMode:CPDefaultRunLoopMode];
00713 }
00714 
00715 - (void)copyEvent:(DOMEvent)aDOMEvent
00716 {
00717     if ([self _validateCopyCutOrPasteEvent:aDOMEvent flags:CPPlatformActionKeyMask] && !_ignoreNativeCopyOrCutEvent)
00718     {
00719         //we have to send out a fake copy or cut event so that we can force the copy/cut mechanisms to take place
00720         var cut = aDOMEvent.type === "beforecut",
00721             keyCode = cut ? CPKeyCodes.X : CPKeyCodes.C,
00722             characters = cut ? "x" : "c",
00723             timestamp = aDOMEvent.timeStamp ? aDOMEvent.timeStamp : new Date(),
00724             windowNumber = [[CPApp keyWindow] windowNumber],
00725             modifierFlags = CPPlatformActionKeyMask;
00726 
00727         event = [CPEvent keyEventWithType:CPKeyDown location:location modifierFlags:modifierFlags
00728                     timestamp:timestamp windowNumber:windowNumber context:nil
00729                     characters:characters charactersIgnoringModifiers:characters isARepeat:NO keyCode:keyCode];
00730 
00731         event._DOMEvent = aDOMEvent;
00732         [CPApp sendEvent:event];
00733 
00734         [self _primePasteboardElement];
00735 
00736         //then we have to IGNORE the real keyboard event to prevent a double copy
00737         //safari also sends the beforecopy event twice, so we additionally check here and prevent two events
00738         _ignoreNativeCopyOrCutEvent = YES;
00739     }
00740 
00741     [[CPRunLoop currentRunLoop] limitDateForMode:CPDefaultRunLoopMode];
00742 }
00743 
00744 - (void)pasteEvent:(DOMEvent)aDOMEvent
00745 {
00746     if ([self _validateCopyCutOrPasteEvent:aDOMEvent flags:CPPlatformActionKeyMask])
00747     {
00748         _DOMPasteboardElement.focus();
00749         _DOMPasteboardElement.select();
00750         _DOMPasteboardElement.value = "";
00751         _ignoreNativePastePreparation = YES;
00752     }
00753 
00754     [[CPRunLoop currentRunLoop] limitDateForMode:CPDefaultRunLoopMode];
00755 }
00756 
00757 - (void)_validateCopyCutOrPasteEvent:(DOMEvent)aDOMEvent flags:(unsigned)modifierFlags
00758 {
00759     return (
00760             ((aDOMEvent.target || aDOMEvent.srcElement).nodeName.toUpperCase() !== "INPUT" &&
00761              (aDOMEvent.target || aDOMEvent.srcElement).nodeName.toUpperCase() !== "TEXTAREA"
00762             ) || aDOMEvent.target === _DOMPasteboardElement
00763            ) &&
00764             (modifierFlags & CPPlatformActionKeyMask);
00765 }
00766 
00767 - (void)_primePasteboardElement
00768 {
00769     var pasteboard = [CPPasteboard generalPasteboard],
00770         types = [pasteboard types];
00771 
00772     if (types.length)
00773     {
00774         if ([types indexOfObjectIdenticalTo:CPStringPboardType] != CPNotFound)
00775             _DOMPasteboardElement.value = [pasteboard stringForType:CPStringPboardType];
00776         else
00777             _DOMPasteboardElement.value = [pasteboard _generateStateUID];
00778 
00779         _DOMPasteboardElement.focus();
00780         _DOMPasteboardElement.select();
00781 
00782         window.setNativeTimeout(function() { [self _clearPasteboardElement]; }, 0);
00783     }
00784 }
00785 
00786 
00787 - (void)_checkPasteboardElement
00788 {
00789     var value = _DOMPasteboardElement.value;
00790 
00791     if ([value length])
00792     {
00793         var pasteboard = [CPPasteboard generalPasteboard];
00794 
00795         if ([pasteboard _stateUID] != value)
00796         {
00797             [pasteboard declareTypes:[CPStringPboardType] owner:self];
00798             [pasteboard setString:value forType:CPStringPboardType];
00799         }
00800     }
00801 
00802     [self _clearPasteboardElement];
00803 
00804     [CPApp sendEvent:_pasteboardKeyDownEvent];
00805 
00806     _pasteboardKeyDownEvent = nil;
00807 
00808     [[CPRunLoop currentRunLoop] limitDateForMode:CPDefaultRunLoopMode];
00809 }
00810 
00811 - (void)_clearPasteboardElement
00812 {
00813     _DOMPasteboardElement.value = "";
00814     _DOMPasteboardElement.blur();
00815 }
00816 
00817 - (void)scrollEvent:(DOMEvent)aDOMEvent
00818 {
00819     if(!aDOMEvent)
00820         aDOMEvent = window.event;
00821 
00822     if (CPFeatureIsCompatible(CPJavaScriptMouseWheelValues_8_15))
00823     {
00824         var x = 0.0,
00825             y = 0.0,
00826             element = aDOMEvent.target;
00827         
00828         while (element.nodeType !== 1)
00829             element = element.parentNode;
00830 
00831         if (element.offsetParent)
00832         {
00833             do
00834             {
00835                 x += element.offsetLeft;
00836                 y += element.offsetTop;
00837     
00838             } while (element = element.offsetParent);
00839         }
00840     
00841         var location = _CGPointMake((x + ((aDOMEvent.clientX - 8) / 15)), (y + ((aDOMEvent.clientY - 8) / 15)));
00842     }
00843     else
00844         var location = _CGPointMake(aDOMEvent.clientX, aDOMEvent.clientY);
00845         
00846     var deltaX = 0.0,
00847         deltaY = 0.0,
00848         windowNumber = 0,
00849         timestamp = aDOMEvent.timeStamp ? aDOMEvent.timeStamp : new Date(),
00850         modifierFlags = (aDOMEvent.shiftKey ? CPShiftKeyMask : 0) | 
00851                         (aDOMEvent.ctrlKey ? CPControlKeyMask : 0) | 
00852                         (aDOMEvent.altKey ? CPAlternateKeyMask : 0) | 
00853                         (aDOMEvent.metaKey ? CPCommandKeyMask : 0);
00854           
00855     StopDOMEventPropagation = YES;
00856 
00857     var theWindow = [self hitTest:location];
00858 
00859     if (!theWindow)
00860         return;
00861 
00862     var windowNumber = [theWindow windowNumber];
00863 
00864     location = [theWindow convertBridgeToBase:location];
00865 
00866     if(typeof aDOMEvent.wheelDeltaX != "undefined")
00867     {
00868         deltaX = aDOMEvent.wheelDeltaX / 120.0;
00869         deltaY = aDOMEvent.wheelDeltaY / 120.0;
00870     }
00871     
00872     else if (aDOMEvent.wheelDelta)
00873         deltaY = aDOMEvent.wheelDelta / 120.0;
00874     
00875     else if (aDOMEvent.detail) 
00876         deltaY = -aDOMEvent.detail / 3.0;
00877     
00878     else
00879         return;        
00880 
00881     if(!CPFeatureIsCompatible(CPJavaScriptNegativeMouseWheelValues))
00882     {
00883         deltaX = -deltaX;
00884         deltaY = -deltaY;
00885     }
00886     
00887     var event = [CPEvent mouseEventWithType:CPScrollWheel location:location modifierFlags:modifierFlags
00888             timestamp:timestamp windowNumber:windowNumber context:nil eventNumber:-1 clickCount:1 pressure:0 ];
00889     
00890     event._DOMEvent = aDOMEvent;
00891     event._deltaX = deltaX;
00892     event._deltaY = deltaY;
00893     
00894     [CPApp sendEvent:event];
00895         
00896     if (StopDOMEventPropagation)
00897         CPDOMEventStop(aDOMEvent, self);
00898 
00899     [[CPRunLoop currentRunLoop] limitDateForMode:CPDefaultRunLoopMode];
00900 }
00901 
00902 - (void)resizeEvent:(DOMEvent)aDOMEvent
00903 {
00904     // FIXME: This is not the right way to do this.
00905     // We should pay attention to mouse down and mouse up in conjunction with this.
00906     //window.liveResize = YES;
00907 
00908     if ([CPPlatform isBrowser])
00909         [CPApp._activeMenu cancelTracking];
00910 
00911     var oldSize = [self contentRect].size;
00912 
00913     [self updateFromNativeContentRect];
00914 
00915     var levels = _windowLevels,
00916         layers = _windowLayers,
00917         levelCount = levels.length;
00918 
00919     while (levelCount--)
00920     {
00921         var windows = [layers objectForKey:levels[levelCount]]._windows,
00922             windowCount = windows.length;
00923 
00924         while (windowCount--)
00925             [windows[windowCount] resizeWithOldPlatformWindowSize:oldSize];
00926     }
00927 
00928     //window.liveResize = NO;
00929 
00930     [[CPRunLoop currentRunLoop] limitDateForMode:CPDefaultRunLoopMode];
00931 }
00932 
00933 - (void)touchEvent:(DOMEvent)aDOMEvent
00934 {
00935     if (aDOMEvent.touches && (aDOMEvent.touches.length == 1 || (aDOMEvent.touches.length == 0 && aDOMEvent.changedTouches.length == 1)))
00936     {
00937         var newEvent = {};
00938         
00939         switch(aDOMEvent.type)
00940         {
00941             case CPDOMEventTouchStart:  newEvent.type = CPDOMEventMouseDown;
00942                                         break;
00943             case CPDOMEventTouchEnd:    newEvent.type = CPDOMEventMouseUp;
00944                                         break;
00945             case CPDOMEventTouchMove:   newEvent.type = CPDOMEventMouseMoved;
00946                                         break;
00947             case CPDOMEventTouchCancel: newEvent.type = CPDOMEventMouseUp;
00948                                         break;
00949         }
00950 
00951         var touch = aDOMEvent.touches.length ? aDOMEvent.touches[0] : aDOMEvent.changedTouches[0];
00952         
00953         newEvent.clientX = touch.clientX;
00954         newEvent.clientY = touch.clientY;
00955         
00956         newEvent.timestamp = aDOMEvent.timestamp;
00957         newEvent.target = aDOMEvent.target;
00958         
00959         newEvent.shiftKey = newEvent.ctrlKey = newEvent.altKey = newEvent.metaKey = false;
00960         
00961         newEvent.preventDefault = function(){if(aDOMEvent.preventDefault) aDOMEvent.preventDefault()};
00962         newEvent.stopPropagation = function(){if(aDOMEvent.stopPropagation) aDOMEvent.stopPropagation()};
00963         
00964         [self mouseEvent:newEvent];
00965     
00966         return;
00967     }
00968     else
00969     {
00970         if (aDOMEvent.preventDefault)
00971             aDOMEvent.preventDefault();
00972         
00973         if (aDOMEvent.stopPropagation)
00974             aDOMEvent.stopPropagation();
00975     }
00976     // handle touch cases specifically
00977 }
00978 
00979 - (void)mouseEvent:(DOMEvent)aDOMEvent
00980 {
00981     var type = _overriddenEventType || aDOMEvent.type;
00982 
00983     // IE's event order is down, up, up, dblclick, so we have create these events artificially.
00984     if (type === @"dblclick")
00985     {
00986         _overriddenEventType = CPDOMEventMouseDown;
00987         [self mouseEvent:aDOMEvent];
00988 
00989         _overriddenEventType = CPDOMEventMouseUp;
00990         [self mouseEvent:aDOMEvent];
00991 
00992         _overriddenEventType = nil;
00993 
00994         return;         
00995     }
00996 
00997     var event,
00998         location = _CGPointMake(aDOMEvent.clientX, aDOMEvent.clientY),
00999         timestamp = aDOMEvent.timeStamp ? aDOMEvent.timeStamp : new Date(),
01000         sourceElement = (aDOMEvent.target || aDOMEvent.srcElement),
01001         windowNumber = 0,
01002         modifierFlags = (aDOMEvent.shiftKey ? CPShiftKeyMask : 0) | 
01003                         (aDOMEvent.ctrlKey ? CPControlKeyMask : 0) | 
01004                         (aDOMEvent.altKey ? CPAlternateKeyMask : 0) | 
01005                         (aDOMEvent.metaKey ? CPCommandKeyMask : 0);
01006 
01007     StopDOMEventPropagation = YES;
01008 
01009     if (_mouseDownWindow)
01010         windowNumber = [_mouseDownWindow windowNumber];
01011 
01012     else
01013     {
01014         var theWindow = [self hitTest:location];
01015 
01016         if ((aDOMEvent.type === CPDOMEventMouseDown) && theWindow)
01017             _mouseDownWindow = theWindow;
01018 
01019         windowNumber = [theWindow windowNumber];
01020     }
01021 
01022     if (windowNumber)
01023         location = [CPApp._windows[windowNumber] convertPlatformWindowToBase:location];
01024 
01025     if (type === "mouseup")
01026     {
01027         if(_mouseIsDown)
01028         {
01029             event = _CPEventFromNativeMouseEvent(aDOMEvent, CPLeftMouseUp, location, modifierFlags, timestamp, windowNumber, nil, -1, CPDOMEventGetClickCount(_lastMouseUp, timestamp, location), 0);
01030         
01031             _mouseIsDown = NO;
01032             _lastMouseUp = event;
01033             _mouseDownWindow = nil;
01034         }
01035 
01036         if(_DOMEventMode)
01037         {
01038             _DOMEventMode = NO;
01039             return;
01040         }
01041     }
01042     
01043     else if (type === "mousedown")
01044     {
01045         if (sourceElement.tagName === "INPUT" && sourceElement != _DOMFocusElement)
01046         {
01047             if ([CPPlatform supportsDragAndDrop])
01048             {
01049                 _DOMBodyElement.setAttribute("draggable", "false");
01050                 _DOMBodyElement.style["-khtml-user-drag"] = "none";
01051             }
01052 
01053             _DOMEventMode = YES;
01054             _mouseIsDown = YES;
01055 
01056             //fake a down and up event so that event tracking mode will work correctly
01057             [CPApp sendEvent:[CPEvent mouseEventWithType:CPLeftMouseDown location:location modifierFlags:modifierFlags
01058                     timestamp:timestamp windowNumber:windowNumber context:nil eventNumber:-1 
01059                     clickCount:CPDOMEventGetClickCount(_lastMouseDown, timestamp, location) pressure:0]];
01060 
01061             [CPApp sendEvent:[CPEvent mouseEventWithType:CPLeftMouseUp location:location modifierFlags:modifierFlags
01062                     timestamp:timestamp windowNumber:windowNumber context:nil eventNumber:-1 
01063                     clickCount:CPDOMEventGetClickCount(_lastMouseDown, timestamp, location) pressure:0]];
01064 
01065             return;
01066         }
01067         else if ([CPPlatform supportsDragAndDrop])
01068         {
01069             _DOMBodyElement.setAttribute("draggable", "true");
01070             _DOMBodyElement.style["-khtml-user-drag"] = "element";
01071         }
01072 
01073         event = _CPEventFromNativeMouseEvent(aDOMEvent, CPLeftMouseDown, location, modifierFlags, timestamp, windowNumber, nil, -1, CPDOMEventGetClickCount(_lastMouseDown, timestamp, location), 0);
01074                     
01075         _mouseIsDown = YES;
01076         _lastMouseDown = event;
01077     }
01078     
01079     else // if (type === "mousemove" || type === "drag")
01080     {
01081         if (_DOMEventMode)
01082             return;
01083 
01084         event = _CPEventFromNativeMouseEvent(aDOMEvent, _mouseIsDown ? CPLeftMouseDragged : CPMouseMoved, location, modifierFlags, timestamp, windowNumber, nil, -1, 1, 0);
01085     }
01086 
01087     var isDragging = [[CPDragServer sharedDragServer] isDragging];
01088 
01089     if (event && (!isDragging || !supportsNativeDragAndDrop))
01090     {
01091         event._DOMEvent = aDOMEvent;
01092         
01093         [CPApp sendEvent:event];
01094     }
01095 
01096     if (StopDOMEventPropagation && (!supportsNativeDragAndDrop || type !== "mousedown" && !isDragging))
01097         CPDOMEventStop(aDOMEvent, self);
01098 
01099     [[CPRunLoop currentRunLoop] limitDateForMode:CPDefaultRunLoopMode];
01100 }
01101 
01102  (CPArray)orderedWindowsAtLevel:(int)aLevel
01103 {
01104     var layer = [self layerAtLevel:aLevel create:NO];
01105     
01106     if (!layer)
01107         return [];
01108     
01109     return [layer orderedWindows];
01110 }
01111 
01112 - (CPDOMWindowLayer)layerAtLevel:(int)aLevel create:(BOOL)aFlag
01113 {
01114     var layer = [_windowLayers objectForKey:aLevel];
01115     
01116     // If the layer doesn't currently exist, and the create flag is true,
01117     // create the layer.
01118     if (!layer && aFlag)
01119     {
01120         layer = [[CPDOMWindowLayer alloc] initWithLevel:aLevel];
01121         
01122         [_windowLayers setObject:layer forKey:aLevel];
01123         
01124         // Find the nearest layer.  This is similar to a binary search, 
01125         // only we know we won't find the value.
01126         var low = 0,
01127             high = _windowLevels.length - 1,
01128             middle;
01129             
01130         while (low <= high)
01131         {
01132             middle = FLOOR((low + high) / 2);
01133             
01134             if (_windowLevels[middle] > aLevel)
01135                 high = middle - 1;
01136             else
01137                 low = middle + 1;
01138         }
01139 
01140         [_windowLevels insertObject:aLevel atIndex:_windowLevels[middle] > aLevel ? middle : middle + 1];
01141         layer._DOMElement.style.zIndex = aLevel;
01142         _DOMBodyElement.appendChild(layer._DOMElement);
01143     }
01144     
01145     return layer;
01146 }
01147 
01148 - (void)order:(CPWindowOrderingMode)aPlace window:(CPWindow)aWindow relativeTo:(CPWindow)otherWindow
01149 {
01150     [CPPlatform initializeScreenIfNecessary];
01151 
01152     // Grab the appropriate level for the layer, and create it if 
01153     // necessary (if we are not simply removing the window).
01154     var layer = [self layerAtLevel:[aWindow level] create:aPlace != CPWindowOut];
01155         
01156     // Ignore otherWindow, simply remove this window from it's level.  
01157     // If layer is nil, this will be a no-op.
01158     if (aPlace == CPWindowOut)
01159         return [layer removeWindow:aWindow];
01160 
01161     // Place the window at the appropriate index.
01162     [layer insertWindow:aWindow atIndex:(otherWindow ? (aPlace == CPWindowAbove ? otherWindow._index + 1 : otherWindow._index) : CPNotFound)];
01163 }
01164 
01165 - (void)_removeLayers
01166 {
01167     var levels = _windowLevels,
01168         layers = _windowLayers,
01169         levelCount = levels.length;
01170 
01171     while (levelCount--)
01172     {
01173         var layer = [layers objectForKey:levels[levelCount]];
01174 
01175         _DOMBodyElement.removeChild(layer._DOMElement);
01176     }
01177 }
01178 
01179 - (void)_addLayers
01180 {
01181     var levels = _windowLevels,
01182         layers = _windowLayers,
01183         levelCount = levels.length;
01184 
01185     while (levelCount--)
01186     {
01187         var layer = [layers objectForKey:levels[levelCount]];
01188 
01189         _DOMBodyElement.appendChild(layer._DOMElement);
01190     }
01191 }
01192 
01193 /* @ignore */
01194 - (id)_dragHitTest:(CPPoint)aPoint pasteboard:(CPPasteboard)aPasteboard
01195 {
01196     var levels = _windowLevels,
01197         layers = _windowLayers,
01198         levelCount = levels.length;
01199 
01200     while (levelCount--)
01201     {
01202         // Skip any windows above or at the dragging level.
01203         if (levels[levelCount] >= CPDraggingWindowLevel)
01204             continue;
01205         
01206         var windows = [layers objectForKey:levels[levelCount]]._windows,
01207             windowCount = windows.length;
01208         
01209         while (windowCount--)
01210         {
01211             var theWindow = windows[windowCount];
01212 
01213             if ([theWindow _sharesChromeWithPlatformWindow])
01214                 return [theWindow _dragHitTest:aPoint pasteboard:aPasteboard];
01215 
01216             if ([theWindow containsPoint:aPoint])
01217                 return [theWindow _dragHitTest:aPoint pasteboard:aPasteboard];
01218         }
01219     }
01220     
01221     return nil;
01222 }
01223 
01224 /* @ignore */
01225 - (void)_propagateCurrentDOMEvent:(BOOL)aFlag
01226 {
01227     StopDOMEventPropagation = !aFlag;
01228 }
01229 
01230 - (BOOL)_willPropagateCurrentDOMEvent
01231 {
01232     return !StopDOMEventPropagation;
01233 }
01234 
01235 - (CPWindow)hitTest:(CPPoint)location
01236 {
01237     if (self._only) 
01238         return self._only;
01239 
01240     var levels = _windowLevels,
01241         layers = _windowLayers,
01242         levelCount = levels.length,
01243         theWindow = nil;
01244 
01245     while (levelCount-- && !theWindow)
01246     {
01247         var windows = [layers objectForKey:levels[levelCount]]._windows,
01248             windowCount = windows.length;
01249 
01250         while (windowCount-- && !theWindow)
01251         {
01252             var candidateWindow = windows[windowCount];
01253             
01254             if (!candidateWindow._ignoresMouseEvents && [candidateWindow containsPoint:location])
01255                 theWindow = candidateWindow;
01256         }
01257     }
01258 
01259     return theWindow;
01260 }
01261 
01269 + (void)preventCharacterKeysFromPropagating:(CPArray)characters
01270 {
01271     for(var i=characters.length; i>0; i--)
01272         CharacterKeysToPrevent[""+characters[i-1].toLowerCase()] = YES;
01273 }
01274 
01278 + (void)preventCharacterKeyFromPropagating:(CPString)character
01279 {
01280     CharacterKeysToPrevent[character.toLowerCase()] = YES;
01281 }
01282 
01286 + (void)clearCharacterKeysToPreventFromPropagating
01287 {
01288     CharacterKeysToPrevent = {};
01289 }

01295 + (void)preventKeyCodesFromPropagating:(CPArray)keyCodes
01296 {
01297     for(var i=keyCodes.length; i>0; i--)
01298         KeyCodesToPrevent[keyCodes[i-1]] = YES;
01299 }

01322 var _CPEventFromNativeMouseEvent = function(aNativeEvent, anEventType, aPoint, modifierFlags, aTimestamp, aWindowNumber, aGraphicsContext, anEventNumber, aClickCount, aPressure)
01323 {
01324     aNativeEvent.isa = CPEventClass;
01325 
01326     aNativeEvent._type = anEventType;
01327     aNativeEvent._location = aPoint;
01328     aNativeEvent._modifierFlags = modifierFlags;
01329     aNativeEvent._timestamp = aTimestamp;
01330     aNativeEvent._windowNumber = aWindowNumber;
01331     aNativeEvent._window = nil;
01332     aNativeEvent._context = aGraphicsContext;
01333     aNativeEvent._eventNumber = anEventNumber;
01334     aNativeEvent._clickCount = aClickCount;
01335     aNativeEvent._pressure = aPressure;
01336 
01337     return aNativeEvent;
01338 }
01339 
01340 var CLICK_SPACE_DELTA   = 5.0,
01341     CLICK_TIME_DELTA    = (typeof document != "undefined" && document.addEventListener) ? 350.0 : 1000.0;
01342 
01343 var CPDOMEventGetClickCount = function(aComparisonEvent, aTimestamp, aLocation)
01344 {
01345     if (!aComparisonEvent)
01346         return 1;
01347     
01348     var comparisonLocation = [aComparisonEvent locationInWindow];
01349     
01350     return (aTimestamp - [aComparisonEvent timestamp] < CLICK_TIME_DELTA && 
01351         ABS(comparisonLocation.x - aLocation.x) < CLICK_SPACE_DELTA && 
01352         ABS(comparisonLocation.y - aLocation.y) < CLICK_SPACE_DELTA) ? [aComparisonEvent clickCount] + 1 : 1;
01353 }
01354 
01355 var CPDOMEventStop = function(aDOMEvent, aPlatformWindow)
01356 {
01357     // IE Model
01358     aDOMEvent.cancelBubble = true;
01359     aDOMEvent.returnValue = false;
01360 
01361     // W3C Model
01362     if (aDOMEvent.preventDefault)
01363         aDOMEvent.preventDefault();
01364 
01365     if (aDOMEvent.stopPropagation)
01366         aDOMEvent.stopPropagation();
01367 
01368     if (aDOMEvent.type === CPDOMEventMouseDown)
01369     {
01370         aPlatformWindow._DOMFocusElement.focus();
01371         aPlatformWindow._DOMFocusElement.blur();
01372     }
01373 }

01375 function CPWindowObjectList()
01376 {
01377     var platformWindow = [CPPlatformWindow primaryPlatformWindow],
01378         levels = platformWindow._windowLevels,
01379         layers = platformWindow._windowLayers,
01380         levelCount = levels.length,
01381         windowObjects = [];
01382 
01383     while (levelCount--)
01384     {
01385         var windows = [layers objectForKey:levels[levelCount]]._windows,
01386             windowCount = windows.length;
01387 
01388         while (windowCount--)
01389             windowObjects.push(windows[windowCount]);
01390     }
01391 
01392     return windowObjects;
01393 }
01394 
01395 function CPWindowList()
01396 {
01397     var platformWindow = [CPPlatformWindow primaryPlatformWindow],
01398         levels = platformWindow._windowLevels,
01399         layers = platformWindow._windowLayers,
01400         levelCount = levels.length,
01401         windowNumbers = [];
01402 
01403     while (levelCount--)
01404     {
01405         var windows = [layers objectForKey:levels[levelCount]]._windows,
01406             windowCount = windows.length;
01407 
01408         while (windowCount--)
01409             windowNumbers.push([windows[windowCount] windowNumber]);
01410     }
01411 
01412     return windowNumbers;
01413 }
